about_the_game:
Giddy Protocol is a fast-paced FPS bow shooter where players must escape a simulation controlled by a sarcastic AI. Armed with different types of arrows, you’ll navigate through the simulation's challenges while enduring constant, comedic taunts from the robot overseer. The game combines precise shooting with parkour platforming and puzzle solving, offering an exciting mix of action and strategy.

Product Features:

  • First-person bow combat: Utilize various arrow types to defeat enemies and tackle obstacles in high-stakes situations.

  • Comedic AI antagonist: Experience constant witty banter and taunts as the AI pushes you through its trials.

  • Parkour platforming: Run, jump, and climb through intricate environments, combining agility with combat.

  • Puzzle solving: Test your brainpower with challenging puzzles that stand between you and your escape.

  • Immersive simulation setting: Navigate a dynamic, evolving world with a mix of combat, platforming, and puzzles that constantly challenge your skills.

name: Giddy Protocol

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3 equivalent (dual-core processor)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card with 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Giddy Protocol is a fast-paced FPS bow shooter where you use various arrow types to survive a simulation filled with parkour platforming, puzzles, and a taunting, comedic AI. Battle enemies, solve challenges, and escape the AI's relentless tests with agility and precision.
